notes: These versions were validated together under Node v20.19.5: `npm install` succeeds, `npx vue-tsc --noEmit` succeeds, and `npm run build` succeeds. Use this pinned set to avoid incompatible vue-tsc/typescript combinations that can cause internal vue-tsc crashes (e.g. Search string not found: "/supportedTSExtensions = .*(?=;)/").
